name: Milk Dad Reborn
description:
You play as a normal dad whose job is to get milk but when you tell your wife where you are going she thinks you want to divorce her but the truth is that you are just going to get milk.

Controls:
Arrows - Walking and flying
Shift - Jump
Space - Restart level
X - Skip dialogue

What's in this version that's not in the old one?
- Better plot
- Higher quality audio
- 2 new levels
